sentences.sContent: They first set out to convert the heathen.
sentences.sCn: 他们最初打算教化异教徒。

words.tran: 非基督教的；异教的；未开化的
异教；偶像崇拜；异教教义

trans.tranOther: someone who is not connected with the Christian religion or any of the large established religions – used to show disapproval
not connected with or belonging to the Christian religion or any of the large established religions
